agent-teams.overview: The IMPLEMENTATION workflow uses Claude Code Agent Teams (experimental). This feature MUST be enabled in the project's Claude Code settings: { "env": { "CLAUDE_CODE_EXPERIMENTAL_AGENT_TEAMS": "1" } } The install script provisions this automatically in .claude/settings.local.json.

constraints.rule: Sub-agents (Task tool) cannot spawn other sub-agents
Only the team lead (orchestrator) can spawn teammates
Teammates cannot spawn their own teams or sub-agents
The implementation phase is the ONLY workflow that uses Agent Teams
All other phases (planning, docs, PR) use standard sub-agents via the Task tool
